VIDEO: Bila predstavnica na Evroviziji, zdaj pa nima niti za najemnino
Bebi Dol se je znašla v nezavidljivih težavah.
05 Nov 2019, 19:00 by A. L.
V 80. letih prejšnjega stoletja so o njej govorili kot o perspektivni umetnici, leta 1991 pa je s pesmijo Brazil zastopala Jugoslavijo na Evroviziji. Govorimo o Bebi Dol (pravo ime Dragana Šarić), ki danes šteje 57 let. O pevskih dosežkih ni več slišati veliko, malo je nastopala v resničnostnih šovih, zdaj pa se je v medijih znašla še zaradi dolgov. Portal Novosti piše, da štiri mesece ni poravnala stroškov in najemnine za stanovanje na Vračarju. Lastniku je sprva dejala, naj potrpi kakšen mesec, mesec in pol, saj pričakuje denar, a ko tudi po tem dolgovi niso bili poravnani, jo je skušal priklicati. Oglašala se mu ni na telefon, ko se je po mesecih odpravil do stanovanja, pa je ugotovil, da je izpraznjeno, o njej pa ne duha ne sluha. Prek njenih prijateljev jo je vendarle uspel priklicati, ona pa se mu je menda v solzah opravičevala, rekoč, da jo je sram, ker nima denarja, in da bo ob prvi priložnosti dolgove poravnala.Bebi Dol dolguje lastniku 880 evrov, neporavnani pa so tudi računi. Lastnik sicer verjame, da mu ne bo ostala dolžna.

VIDEO: She was a Eurovision representative, but now she doesn't even have a rent
Bebi Dol found herself in unenviable trouble.
05 Nov 2019, 19:00 by A.L.
In the 1980s, she was referred to as a promising artist, and in 1991, with her song, Brazil represented Yugoslavia at Eurovision. We are talking about Baby Dol (real name Dragana Saric), who is 57 today. There is not much to hear about her singing achievements, few have appeared in reality shows, but now she has found herself in debt in the media. The Novosti portal writes that for four months it has not paid the costs and rent for the apartment in Vracar. At first she told the owner to endure a month, a month and a half, as she expected money, but when the debts were not settled after that, he tried to call her. She did not answer his phone, but when he walked to the apartment after months, he found it empty, and she had no ghost or hearing about it. He managed to call her through her friends, and she reportedly apologized to her in tears, saying that she was ashamed of having no money and that she would pay her debts at the first opportunity. accounts. The owner believes he will not be owed.
